thread.title: Boys soccer: Verona Hillbillies advance in Essex County Tournament
thread.title_full: Boys soccer: Verona Hillbillies advance in Essex County Tournament

title: Boys soccer: Verona Hillbillies advance in Essex County Tournament
text:
Boys soccer: Verona Hillbillies advance in Essex County Tournament October 23, 2015 Last updated: Friday, October 23, 2015, 5:23 PM Verona-Cedar Grove Times Print 
The Verona boys soccer team earned a hard-fought 2-1 home win over Orange in the preliminary round of the Essex County Tournament Monday, Oct. 20 at Centennial Field. Above, junior Thiago Queiroz battles for the ball along the sidelines in the first half. 
Verona entered halftime trailing 1-0 after allowing an early goal, but responded with an aggressive offense and stifling defense in the final 40 minutes. Senior Chris Yeates and junior Doug Spardel each scored in the second half to give Verona the victory. Sophomore Sal Vassallo recorded two assists and junior keeper Billy Czupak registered four saves in the win.
